name: Alaia's Lay-A-Way Plan
description: We are now offering layaway plans that makes it easier to get the beautiful hair you desire in a payment plan. Layaway requires that all clients place a deposit of $75.00 towards their purchase. You can make 6 payments after the initial deposit payment to complete the payment of your order. Full payment of all orders must be received within 42 days from the initial deposit date. After 42 days, any funds paid by client will be voided and not refunded. Items will not be shipped until full payment for the order placed is received. To purchase layaway please click on button below and add to cart. When checking out in PayPal, please indicate your order details in NOTE TO SELLER section. We will email you back with your order details. Once deposit is paid in full you will receive confirmation and your items will be shipped out to you.

name: *NEW* Monroe Blonde #613 Brazilian Silky Straight
description: Welcoming a Splash of Blonde to Alaia's Brazilian hair is a fun and easy way to update your look. Many women wear these hair extensions to enhance their natural beauty, express themselves creatively or just do something fun and different. You know what they say! "Blondes have more fun" Our silky straight  hair extensions are made out of 100% Brazilian hair which features the best quality and intact cuticle. Rich color and all solid strands bring healthy shiny hair you can enjoy. Our hair is Shed and tangle free. Now you can style your real hair with our colored hair extensions to get a new and natural look. Blonde hair makes it easier to be dyed in any funky color you like with out having to use any harsh chemicals to your hair. You can style hair any way you desire. Each bundle is 3.5 oz. For a full sew in we recommend you get 3-4 bundles. If you desire full hair with lots of volume we suggest you go with 4 bundles. Remember the longer the hair the shorter the weft. Monroe Blonde comes in lengths 16"-30"

name: *NEW* COCO HONEY Ombre Brazilian Body Wave
description: Welcoming a splash of color to Alaias Brazilian hair. The term "ombre" is a French word meaning shaded or shading. Ombre hair refers to hair color fading from dark to light, or vice versa. Instead of the color starting from the roots it gradually becomes lighter, or darker towards the ends. Ombre can be very subtle or very striking. Our Brazilian Body Wave Ombre has hues of browns with striking sun kissed blonde towards the ends. Which has a classy touch to it. It is naturally shiny with a soft beautiful wave. Hair can be straighten with a flat iron for a silky straight look or curled for a curly bouncy look. When wet hair will revert back to its natural state. You can style hair as you desire. Our hair is 100% shed and tangle free. Each bundle is 3.5 oz. for a full sew in we suggest 3-4 bundles of hair. If your desire fuller and lots of volume we recommend 4 bundles. Remember the longer the hair the shorter the weft.

name: *NEW*  100% Virgin Brazilian Spiral Wave
description: Our Virgin Brazilian Spiral Wave is the highest quality Brazilian hair on the market. Its healthy virgin hair which has not been chemically processed. Alternate between straight and curly styles so you never go bored. Its thick and beautiful with lots of bouncy loose curls. The bountiful curls just spiral out of control and help you create a head full of  long lasting appearance and matches beautifully with wand curls. Can be blown out, flat ironed straight and when washed it will revert back to its natural state. This Spiral Virgin Brazilian hair is alive. It maintains a natural shine with lots of movement. Each selection has been collected by one donor. This hair is shed-free and tangle free. It can be used for a more natural look for African American hair. Our Virgin Brazilian Hair comes in a natural off black 1b with some hues of brown and will last well over a year with proper care and maintenance. Each bundle is 3.5 oz. For a full sew in we suggest 3-4 bundles. If you desire your hair to be full with lots of volume we suggest you go with 4 bundles. Remember the longer the hair in length the shorter the weft.

name: 100% Virgin Brazilian Super Curl
description: Our Virgin Brazilian Super Curl is the highest quality Brazilian hair on the market. Its healthy virgin hair which has not been chemically processed. It can be worn straight by using a flat iron and bone straight using a straightening serum. When wash it will revert back to its natural state. This curly Virgin Brazilian hair is alive and full of tiny beautiful curls. Its texture is curly and soft with lots of body. It maintains a natural shine with lots of movement. Each selection has been collected by one donor. This hair is shed-free and tangle free. It can be used for a more natural look for African American hair. Our Virgin Brazilian Hair comes in a natural off black 1b with some hues of brown and will last well over a year with proper care and maintenance. Each bundle is 3.5 oz. For a full sew in we suggest 3-4 bundles. If you desire your hair to be full with lots of volume we suggest you go with 4 bundles. Remember the longer the hair in length the shorter the weft.

name: 100% Virgin Brazilian Silky Straight
description: Our Virgin Brazilian Straight Hair is the highest quality of  Virgin Hair on the market. This hair has never been chemically treated, bleached or colored. Virgin Brazilian straight hair is silky, smooth and shiny texture. It is perfect for those who want a straight, sleek look. you can curl, straighten, bleach or dye this hair as much as you would do your own hair and it would look great for a very long time. Our Virgin Brazilian Straight Hair is available in a natural off black 1b mixed with beautiful natural brown tones and will last well up to a year with proper care and maintenance. Each Bundle is 3.5 oz. For a full  sew in we recommend 3-4 bundles. If you desire your hair to be full with lots of volume we suggest you go with 4 bundles. Remember the longer the hair in length the shorter the weft.

name: 100% Virgin Brazilian Body Wave
description: Brazilian hair is one of the most popular types of hair on the market. Brazilian hair is naturally compatible with many hair types including African American and Caucasian. It is good for all hair styles, holds curls beautifully and gives a wet & wavy look when wet. Our Virgin Brazilian hair is collected by one donor and has not been chemically altered or processed. It is 100% shed-free and tangle free, so you can rest assure that you are purchasing top quality hair. We guarantee that you will love our long lasting beautiful virgin hair. For a full sew in we recommend 3-4 bundles. If you desire your hair to be full of volume we suggest you get 4 bundles.

name: 100% Virgin Brazilian Loose Curl
description: Our 100% Brazilian loose wave hair is the highest quality Virgin hair on the market. Its soft and beautiful in texture. It has a lot of body. Virgin Brazilian hair is easily straightened for proper styling. It is excellent for African American women as it looks very natural, yet manageable. Our Virgin Brazilian loose wave is available in a natural off black 1b and will last up to a year with proper care and maintenance.  Each bundle is 3.5 oz. For a full head we recommend 3-4 bundles. If you desire your hair to be full with lots of volume we suggest you go with 4 bundles of hair. Remember the longer the hair the shorter the weft.

name: 100% Virgin Brazilian Deep Wave
description: Our Virgin Brazilian Deep Wave is the highest quality Virgin Brazilian hair on the market. Each selection has been collected from one donor. This hair is soft and has a beautiful wave texture. It has a lot of body. Its very versatile hair, you can achieve many different looks by flat ironing the hair for a straight texture, wet for a wet and wavy look or worn in natural state. This hair will always revert back to original state even after months of use. Our Virgin Brazilian Deep Wave is available in a natural off black 1b and will last well up to a year with proper care and maintenance. Each bundle is 3.5 oz. For a full sew in we recommend 3-5 bundles. If you desire your hair to be full with lots of volume we suggest you go with 4 bundles. Remember the longer the hair the shorter the weft.

name: 100% Virgin Brazilian Natural Wave
description: Our Virgin Brazilian natural wave hair is soft and has lots of beautiful body. It is naturally shiny with a slight wave. This hair is shed-free and tangle free. It never been chemically treated. You can achieve a different look by flat ironing the hair straight or wet it for bouncy curls. This hair will always revert back to its original state, even after months of use. All cuticles are intact and you will notice each selection of our virgin hair has a natural taper at the end. Our Virgin Brazilian Hair is available in a natural off black 1b and will last well up to a year with proper care and maintenance.  Each bundle is 3.5 oz. For a full sew in we  recommend 3-4 bundles. If you desire your hair to be full with lots of volume we suggest you go with 4 bundles of hair.

name: 100% Virgin Malaysian Super Curl
description: Malaysian hair is one of the most exotic hair type in the market. This hair is light, silky and softer in texture then Virgin Brazilian and Peruvian hair. It has a natural shine, curls will not loosen up or drop with time but maintain their form and easy to manage. This hair is compatible with many hair types including African American, Spanish and Caucasian ethnicities. Our Virgin Malaysian hair is collected by one donor and has not been chemically altered or processed. This hair comes in natural browns 1b-2. It is shed-free and tangle free. This hair can be dyed, curled, flat iron to any style desired. All bundles are 3.5 oz. This hair is available in straight, body wave and  super curl. For a full sew in we recommend 3-4 bundles. if you desire full and lots of volume we suggest you go with 4 bundles. Remember the longer the hair the shorter the weft.

name: 100% Virgin Malaysian Body Wave
description: Our Virgin Malaysian Hair is one of the highest quality hair on the market. Each selection has been collected by one donor. These silky smooth waves shows a nice body, perfect luster and can be easily altered to be worn curly or straight and will return to its natural waves. No matter which part of the hair, it always looks full and thick and is touched silky smooth. This hair is shed-free and tangle free. Our Virgin Malaysian Body Wave Hair is available in a natural off black color 1b and sometimes comes in lighter shades of brown and will last over a year with proper care and maintenance. Each bundle is 3.5 oz. For a full sew in we recommend 3-4 bundles. If you desire fuller and lots of volume in your hair we suggest 4 bundles of hair. Remember the longer the hair in length the shorter the weft.

name: 100% Virgin Malaysian Silky Straight
description: Malaysian straight hair is harvest from a Malaysian donor so it has intact cuticle and a perfect sleek style. When moves, it can give you a flowing and bone straight appearance. This hair has a natural shine and luster. Our straight hair can be curled, dyed and styled any way desired. When washed it will revert back to its original straight texture. It is shed-free and tangle free Our Virgin Malaysian Hair comes in a natural brown tones and will last well over a year with proper care and maintenance. For a full sew in we recommend 3-4 bundles. If you desire fuller hair with lots of volume we suggest you go with 4 bundles of hair. Remember the longer the hair the shorter the weft.

name: 100% Virgin Peruvian Straight Hair
description: Our 100% Virgin Peruvian Straight Hair is the highest quality Peruvian human hair on the market. It is collected from a single donor and has not been chemically processed. Peruvian hair is coarser and thicker in texture then Brazilian and Malaysian hair. Meanwhile, Peruvian hair is soft & silky with a sleeker, smoother texture. It looks gorgeous straighten, curled or in its natural state. The lengths are available in 12"-30". Each bundle is 3.5 oz. Our Virgin Peruvian Straight Hair comes in a natural off black color 1b and will last up to a year with proper care and maintenance. For a full sew in we recommend 3-4 bundles. If you desire fuller hair with lots of volume we suggest you go with 4 bundles of hair. Remember the longer the hair the shorter the weft.

name: 100% Virgin Peruvian Body Wave
description: Peruvian hair is coarser in texture then Brazilian and Malaysian hair. It maintains a natural luster and thickness from root to tip, its available in a natural black color 1b. Peruvian hair blends well with African  American relaxed texture. Our Virgin Peruvian is collected by a single donor and has not been chemically treated. It is shed-free and tangle free. This hair can be dyed, flat iron, curled, and styled any way you desire and when washed all wavy hair will revert back to its natural state. Rest assure that you are purchasing high quality hair. We guarantee you that you will love your long lasting beautiful hair. This hair is available in straight and body wave. For a full sew in we recommend 3 -4 bundles. If you desire fuller and lots of volume we suggest you go with 4 bundles. Remember the longer the hair the short the weft. Each bundle is 3.5 oz.

name: 100% Vigin Brazilian Swiss Lace Closures
description: Our top grade Swiss lace closures are used to close your weaves. Lace closures are perfect for balding, thinning at the crown of your head or to protect your hair from heat damage and pulling of your hair from braids and to avoid leaving out your hair with a full head weave, while having countless styling options. It provides instant volume, length, and style with any of our lace closures that come in Virgin Brazilian straight, body wave, deep wave, and super curly  which gives a beautiful natural look. It comes in natural browns, from length's 12"- 18" on a swiss lace 4x4. Very versatile, can be parted in the middle, right or left side. Closures are easy to install and maintain. It can be glued or sewn into place. It can be dyed, curled, flat iron and style any way you desire. ☆All On Sale For A Limited Time☆

name: 100% Virgin Brazilian Silk Base Closure
description: Our hair closures is made from a thin swiss lace with a silk base and the finest 100% virgin hair. This closure is a special hair piece that is sewn onto the crown of your head. Strands of hair are attached to a small cap that imitates your scalp. The lace part provides a healthy and seamless look, and the best quality of our hair allows you to cut,  curl,  straighten and dye as you would do your own natural hair. Closures can be parted and styled any way desired. Our hair silk base closures are tangle and shed free with shine and luster. It provides instant volume,  length,  and style with any of our silk base closures that come in Virgin Brazilian, Malaysian, straight,  body wave, deep wave, natural wave and super curl which gives a beautiful natural look. It comes in natural browns, from lengths 12"-18" on a silk base 3.5.

name: U-Part Wig Service {Hair Sold Separately}
description: We will make your custom U-Part Wig. It is a great alternative to sew ins. The U-part wig is designed to give you the look of a sew in but with out the fuss and stress to your hair. Its easy to install, natural looking and undetectable. Simply pull some of your own hair through the U-shaped opening at the top then blend and style. It allows you to style it any way you desire. If you are tired of weaving your hair, U-part wig is just the replacement for you because of its convenience and versatility. For less then the cost of a sew in which only last a couple of month's, you can have your bundles made into a beautiful, professionally made u-part wig that will last you for up to 1 year or longer with proper care and maintenance. How it work? Our services includes our experience and expertise in constructing you a beautiful and affordable U-Part Wig made with any hair and texture you desire. Hair is sold separately. We do not cut or style the wigs. We will layer your wig with different hair length's that you provide upon request. You can use as many bundles as you like. You must purchase 3 bundles in order to purchase this service but you can add more if you desire to. Once we received payment  and order details, we will begin making your wig. Any hair left over will be returned to you with wig.
